kizuna_ecology_e_02:
What?! Are you telling me you’ve already
registered 400 species of Pokémon to your\r
Pokédex?![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_03:
Wow! WOW! You did it! You completed the
Pokédex! That’s amazing! REALLY amazing![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_04:
Research on the Pokémon of the Paldea region
is moving ahead like never before! And it’s all\r
thanks to you, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_05:
You know, I visited this strange shop the other
day and happened to pick up a little something...\c
Might not seem like much to get a secondhand
gift, but here! From me to you![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_06:
I wish I could give you something a bit better for
your efforts...[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_head_01: Now what’s all this commotion about, I wonder?[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_07:
Ah! Director Clavell! This student of mine
COMPLETED their Pokédex![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_head_03:
[VAR BD06(0000)]What a marvelous accomplishment,
M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss\r
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_08:
[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0201)]HShe really surprised me too, pulling off a feat
like this.[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_head_04:
Well, Mr. Jacq’s delight clearly shows how
commendable your work has been.\c
Please, allow me to reward you with a small gift.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_head_05:
Students who achieve great feats such as this
deserve to be recognized for their hard work.\c
This congratulatory message, penned by the
company that certifies Pokédex completion,\r
is for you.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_head_06:
I reconfigured your Pokédex app so that you may
view your diploma there anytime you like.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_09:
Programming is another of Director Clavell’s
skills, you know.[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_10:
But anyway, you sure did great with the Pokédex,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_11:
If completing the Pokédex was one of the
treasures you were after, then I’d say you’ve had\r
a resounding success on your Treasure Hunt![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_head_07:
Quite right, Mr. Jacq. A fitting comment indeed.
If rather surprising coming from you.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_12:
Hehe... Well, I am h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]iser homeroom teacher, after
all. Got to act like it from time to time, I guess.[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_13:
You may have completed your Pokédex, but
there is still plenty of adventure to be had![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_14:
I hope you’ll keep looking for new Pokémon to
befriend here in Paldea![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_e_head_08:
I very much look forward to watching over your
continued progress as well.[VAR 0114(000A)]
